quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work, and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.

quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
author: African Proverb

quote: Direction is so much more important than speed. Many are going nowhere fast.
author: Unknown

quote: The computer can be used as a tool to liberate and protect people, rather than to control them.
author: Hal Finney
